review.title: “Amazing culture! Wonderful place to work and advance your career to its maximum potential”
review.pros: Pros – Challenging environment, great pay, great benefits, exposure to many clients and opportunities, compassionate people, strong team dynamic, strong ethics, flexible work schedule, great location, feeling of importance
review.cons: Cons – Limited resources of a small startup, mainly pertaining to software and IT services
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Rewarding place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Collaborative, challenging, and dynamic environment
review.cons: Cons – Limited resources, long hours, sometimes a lack of information sharing within the team
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
